de.rcblum.stream.deck.items.animation

Class Animator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rcblum.stream.deck.items.animation.Animator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamKeyListener, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Animator
extends java.lang.Object
implements StreamKeyListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Controller that handles the animation of a key.

    • Field Detail

      • logger

        org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger

      • animators

        java.util.Map<IStreamDeck,Animator[]> animators

      • syncLock

        private static java.lang.Object syncLock

      • streamDeck

        private IStreamDeck streamDeck
        Stream Deck that conatins the key on which the animation should be displayed

      • keyIndex

        private int keyIndex
        Key on above stream deck on which the animation should be displayed

      • animation

        private AnimationStack animation
        Animation Metadata and frames used for animation

      • framePos

        private int framePos
        Frame position on currently played animation

      • frameAdvance

        private int frameAdvance
        Direction on which fram should be used next. When using AnimationStack.REPEAT_PING_PONG this will be inverted, wehn the end of the frames is reached.

      • scheduler

        private java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService scheduler
        Scheduler, that delivers the frames to the stream deck in the frame rate given by animation

      • stopAfterAnimation

        private boolean stopAfterAnimation
        Flag to indicate, that the animation should be stopped afuter the animation finished. This will never happen if the animation is set to loop or ping pong atm.

      • listeners

        private java.util.List<AnimationListener> listeners
        Listeners for when animation state changes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animator

        public Animator(IStreamDeck streamDeck,
                int keyIndex,
                AnimationStack animation)
        Creates an animator for the given stream deck key and AnimationStack
        Parameters:
        streamDeck - Stream Deck with the key
        keyIndex - Index of the key
        animation - AnimationStack that contains framrate trigger loop behavior and frames of the animation

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentIcon

        public SDImage getCurrentIcon()
        Returns the current icon of the animation
        Returns:
        Current frame of the animation

      • onKeyEvent

        public void onKeyEvent(KeyEvent event)
        Checks if the key event should start the animation
        Specified by:
        onKeyEvent in interface StreamKeyListener

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the animation

      • stop

        public void stop(boolean immediate)
        Stops the animation.
        Parameters:
        immediate - true if animation should be stopped immediate, false if the animation should end first. Looped and ping pong animations will not stop with false.

      • run

        public void run()
        Displays one frame of the animation
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Returns boolean if the animation is active
        Returns:
        true if animation is running, false if not

      • addAnimationListener

        public boolean addAnimationListener(AnimationListener listener)
        Adds an animation listener
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to be added
        Returns:
        true if the listener was added, false if not

      • removeAnimationListener

        public boolean removeAnimationListener(AnimationListener listener)
        Remvoes an animation listener
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to be removes
        Returns:
        true if the listener was removed, false if not

        private void fireOnStart()
        Fires a start event call to all listeners
